doc.field: - Fi-Tek Corp said it has signed a letter of intent to acquire [Voice Systems and Services Inc] for an undisclosed amount of stock. It said on completion of the acquisition it would change its name to Voice Systems and Services Inc. It said VBoice Systems has received a 3,600,000 dlr contract to provide FLP Communications of Dallas with voicemail systems through service bureaus located throughout the U.S. and has also contracted to provide voicemail systems and administration to M and S Communications.
